phrs.translation: 研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程

sentences.sentence: Postgraduates now earn 40 percent more than graduates.
sentences.translation: 现在研究生的收入比本科生高40%。

sentences.sentence: He's published dozens of books so far, once been recommended as a textbook for postgraduates.
sentences.translation: 他至今已出版数十本书，他的书曾被推荐为研究生教材。

sentences.sentence: In the last academic year, women accounted for more than half of all Stem postgraduates at UK universities.
sentences.translation: 在上一学年，英国大学所有 Stem 研究生中，女性占了一半以上。
